description.p: While wearing this coat while you aren't attuned to it, you gain +2 AC, and all sources of non magical heat that you are wearing, carry or transport are negated, and no water source can be touched by the coat otherwise, all magical and non magical water will be instantaneously freezed.

While attuned to this raincoat, you can cast Armor of Agathys on yourself at will as a 1st-level spell, without expending a spell slot or material components, and you gain add double proficiency in stealth checks, wether you had proficiency or not.

sheet.description: You can cast Armor of Agathys on yourself at will. Also +{{mercury_trenchcoat:check}} on stealth checks.
